overview: A system designed to facilitate team collaboration by allowing members to create, assign, manage, and track tasks efficiently.

functional_requirements.title: User Registration and Login
functional_requirements.description: Users should be able to register with the system using a unique username and password and subsequently log in.
acceptance_criteria: Users can successfully register with valid credentials.
Users can successfully log in with registered credentials.
The system provides error messages for invalid login attempts.

functional_requirements.title: Task Creation
functional_requirements.description: Members can create new tasks with a title, description, due date, and initial status.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new tasks with all required fields.
Tasks are saved and displayed in the system.
Due dates are validated to ensure they are in the future.

functional_requirements.title: Task Assignment
functional_requirements.description: Members can assign tasks to other members within the system.
acceptance_criteria: Users can assign tasks to other registered users.
The assigned user receives notification of the new assignment.
The task is displayed in the assigned user's task list.

functional_requirements.title: Task Status Update
functional_requirements.description: Members can update the status of a task to 'in progress', 'completed', or 'postponed'.
acceptance_criteria: Users can change the status of tasks assigned to them.
The task status is updated and reflected in the system.
The system maintains a history of status changes.

functional_requirements.title: Task Commenting
functional_requirements.description: Members can add comments to tasks to provide updates, ask questions, or share information.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add comments to tasks.
Comments are displayed chronologically on the task detail page.

functional_requirements.title: Admin Privileges
functional_requirements.description: Admin users have elevated privileges, allowing them to manage users and potentially project settings.
acceptance_criteria: Admin users can manage other users (add, remove, edit).
Admin users can access system configuration settings (if any).

non_functional_requirements.description: The system should respond to user actions within 2 seconds.
non_functional_requirements.constraints: The system should be able to handle 100 concurrent users.

non_functional_requirements.description: User passwords should be securely stored using hashing.
non_functional_requirements.constraints: The system should be protected against common web vulnerabilities such as SQL injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

non_functional_requirements.description: The user interface should be intuitive and easy to navigate.
non_functional_requirements.constraints: The system should be accessible on common web browsers and mobile devices.

attributes.description: Foreign key referencing User.user_id. User that created the task

attributes.name: user_id
attributes.description: Foreign key referencing User.user_id. User creating the comment

api_endpoints.description: Adds a comment to a task.
Retrieves all comments for a task.

assumptions: User roles are limited to 'admin' and 'member'.
Tasks are independent and not part of larger projects.
Notification mechanism is not defined and can be implemented via email, in-app notifications or another means.
open_questions: What specific permissions are required for the admin role?
How should notifications of task assignments and status updates be implemented?
Is there a need for task dependencies?
Are there any reporting requirements for tasks or user activity?

metadata.original_description: I need a team task management system where members can create tasks, assign tasks to others, mark them as completed, and comment on each task. Each task should have a title, description, due date, and status (in progress, completed, postponed). The system should have a login feature and permissions between admin and members.
